text: this morning in sanaa we woke up the
news that one of the most important army
commanders in yemen brigadier general
ali mohsin solid announced that he was
joining the anti-government protest
movement in yemen and that his forces
would be used to protect the protesters
this comes after brutal violence was
used against professors last Friday
President Saleh still has army loyal to
him his son and other family members
rural parts of the army so what we're
seeing right now in sanaa are their
troops and tanks lining up protecting
the presidential palace however
surrounding the anti-government protest
in sanaa there are troops belonging to
Ali muffins I went up to the Troops this
morning I said who are you with and they
responded to me all in unison we are
with the people so this is a definite
shift the anti-government protests it's
been the largest I've ever been more and
more people are starting to camp out at
the demonstration which now stretches on
for over a mile the atmosphere at the
protest today was very optimistic I had
one man say to me today is going to be a
holiday in Yemen because it's going to
be the day that all the abilify was
forced to step down what people are
predicting is that it will all play out
in the next 12 hours they think that
either it will grow very violence is
between the two competing are mean or
some people think that this actually
might be a way for solid to save face
and set down that him and ali mohsin are
working together ali muffin and solid
are from the same tribe and in yemen
tribal loyalties are very very important
more important than political loyalties
so there is speculation that he will
step down and that will see a
transitional government
you
